content: now ready to begin the gusset decreases a bookmark for dobby this pattern is for personal use only - © 2018 kay jones 3 do not reproduce mrsbakerybear@gmail com gusset decreases foot round 1 - knit to 3 stitches before the first marker on the next round you can remove the stitch markers and k2tog k1 slip marker and then knit to the second rearrange your stitches so that you have your instep stitches marker or in pattern if using one slip marker k1 ssk on needle 1 and your sole stitches on needle 2 knit to end of round knit 15 rounds or to the end of a pattern repeat if you are round 2 - knit to first marker slip marker and then knit to using one of the pattern options the second marker or in pattern if using one slip marker and knit to end of round toe decreases repeat these 2 rounds until you are back to 32 stitches 16 round 1 - k2 k2tog to end of round 24sts on each needle knit 3 rounds round 5 - k1 k2tog to end of round 16sts knit 2 rounds round 8 - k2tog to end of round 8sts you will now have 8 stitches on your needle which you can graft using the kitchener stitch technique all that is left to do is to weave in your ends and then wash and block your sock a bookmark for dobby this pattern is for personal use only - © 2018 kay jones 4 do not reproduce mrsbakerybear@gmail com
